meanings.sent1: The marbly floor in the museum looked shiny and smooth.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen countertop had a marbly pattern that made it look elegant.
meanings.sent3: The marbly statue in the park seemed so real that birds tried to perch on it.
meanings.sent4: Her skin felt marbly cold after swimming in the chilly pool.
meanings.sent5: The marbly columns of the ancient building stood tall and majestic.

meanings.definition: Having the appearance or qualities of marble.
meanings.sent1: The marbly cake was so delicious and moist.
meanings.sent2: The marbly texture of the fabric made it feel luxurious.
meanings.sent3: She painted her nails with a marbly design that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The marbly pattern on the vase made it look like a valuable antique.
meanings.sent5: The marbly swirls in the ice cream cone made it a delightful treat.
